messages.content:
FitPulse X2 Launch

San Francisco, CA – March 15, 2025 – Today, FitPulse announces the launch of FitPulse X2, an AI‑powered fitness tracker that delivers real‑time health insights. Designed for active individuals, FitPulse X2 combines advanced sensor technology with machine‑learning algorithms to provide personalized activity recommendations.

"FitPulse X2 redefines how people track health with real‑time AI insights," said Dr. Maya Patel, CEO of FitPulse. "Our goal is to empower users to make smarter decisions about their wellbeing.".

Key features include:
- AI‑driven activity detection
- Continuous heart‑rate monitoring
- Adaptive goal setting
- Seamless integration with popular health apps

For more information, visit https://fitpulse.com/x2.
